pr_title: ILM: Add support for the searchable_snapshot action in the hot phase

timeline.message: Enable the searchable_snapshot action in the hot phase
Add IT for restoring index mounted as searchable snapshot

timeline.bodyText: @dakrone do you think we should aim to prevent this case when updating the policy?
timeline.author: andreidan

replies.bodyText: No I don't think so, I think we should allow a user to remove searchable snapshots from the policy as well as adding other actions (post searchable snapshot for instance) that should run just fine.
replies.author: dakrone

timeline.bodyText:
@dakrone there are several setting we configure for a searchable snapshot. I wonder if we should be more strict here and check the index name is configured for this setting? I chose not to as that's an invariant that should be guaranteed by the searchable-snapshots module. Is there a better setting to use here?
What do you think?
timeline.author: andreidan
